title: US Bonds Slip as Data Reinforces Trader Bets on a Fed Pause
description: Traders’ expectations that the Federal Reserve will delay interest-rate cuts until later in 2026 were reinforced by US economic data showing resilience in the job market and consumer spending.
content: Traders’ expectations that the Federal Reserve will delay interest-rate cuts until later in 2026 were reinforced by US economic data showing resilience in the job market and consumer spending.
